titleInfo.title: Store and filling station, Cheniere Caminada, LA

mods.abstract: The busy general store and filling station at Cheniere Caminada, operated by the energetic Clarence J. Frazier. Less than 10 years ago, Frazier started his business on the ridge that 'rose from the dead.'
